name: 0 - 9 (GMTK Game Jam 2021)
description:
0 - 9 is a short minimalist platformer where the player controls two characters at the same time(the controls are joined together).  This game was made in under 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Controls: 
    arrow keys or WASD to move

Credits:
    hahahapapa - programming and art
    Blibdoolploop - music
